pull.title: test: Remove last uses of snprintf and simplify
pull.body:
These are the only remaining uses of `snprintf` in our project, and they can cause unexpected issues -- for example, see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/27014. Change them to use our `ToString` (which uses a locale-independent version of `std::to_string`) to convert an `int` to `std::string`. Also remove resulting unused parts of `StringContentsSerializer`.

Closes https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/27014

events.message:
Remove use of snprintf and simplify

One test case uses snprintf to convert an
int to a string. Change it to use ToString
(which uses a locale-independent version of
std::to_string). Also remove unnecessary
parts of StringContentsSerializer.

events.body: Concept ACK. Maybe verify if the linter files need updating (test/lint/lint-locale-dependence.py?)

> Maybe verify if the linter files need updating (test/lint/lint-locale-dependence.py?)

Thanks! Pushed that change about a half hour ago. You were too quick ðŸ˜„

issue.title: Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code
issue.body:
This PR adds an `-estlog` option for saving live fee estimation data from a bitcoin node, and a `fee_est` command line tool for processing the data and testing fee estimation code.

The idea is to make it easier to test improvements to fee estimation like https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10199 in a more systematic and reproducible way.

Some documentation is in [`src/test/fee_est/README.md`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/blob/pr/fee/src/test/fee_est/README.md)

Sample log file: [`est.log.xz`](https://storage.googleapis.com/ryanofsky/est.log.xz) (65M)

Sample [`fee_est.cpp`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/blob/pr/fee/src/test/fee_est/fee_est.cpp)  graph output: 

![graph](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7133040/26331057/f2de8d0c-3f1c-11e7-99ea-de1801d13b05.png)

issue.title: net: remove orphaned CSubNet::SanityCheck()
issue.body:
`CSubNet::SanityCheck()` was added in #20140, and not removed in #22570 when it became orphaned code.

Also, remove an out-of-date `snprintf` TODO that was resolved in #27036, and fix up 2 words to make the spelling linter green again.
